One other thing was tutor  hardly ever uses comments in his code. If he did then it would help us leave comments all over remembering what each section of code referred to.

results.content:
Now! I am on halfway of this course and after halfway its great time to review any course.

There are few things like to mention about this course so people can find it easy before buying it, there are some advantage of this course and some disadvantage.

Advantage:-

1) A great course for someone who want to learn PHP,Javascript and mySql.

2) I have bought few courses online but this is the hardest till now and it’s good because I am learning something good.

3) All codes of this course wrote really well and student can’t copy paste code this course, student have to do hard work and think before write this course code which is good because lot of online course people just copy and paste.

4) Aizaz  always replies about question and he help until the issue fix.
5) This course you won’t find at University or youtube or online platform.
6) Last thing GO FOR IT, it’s one of the great course online and you will learn a lot.

Disadvantage:-

1) Voice recording is not that good but you can understand and I can understand his voice, but there are few people in the world they just want to listens clear & beautiful voice but if you want to achieve something, have to hard work.

2) This course is not for beginners, you have to know little bit about php,javascript,html,css and mysql.

So I would recommend this course to anyone who want to learn more advanced features

Thanks Aizaz  for this course, you did great job and please make more courses and if you can please make course how to make amazon shopping website & their CMS,or Youtube clone or ebay clone.

response.content: Thank your for your honest review, I'm glad you liked this course, and yes i will definitely create courses on that. Again thank you :)
response.content_html: Thank your for your honest review, I'm glad you liked this course, and yes i will definitely create courses on that. Again thank you :)

results.content: I'm so excited to take this course! The instructor seems really engaging the content seems up to date for PHP, and he speaks with a clear voice that I can understand. I'm sure I will love this course as I go through it! I've been looking all over for a good well-rounded course on PHP, but they're either to short or so disorganized that it's hard to follow and stay motivated. Wish me luck and I wish anyone else luck that decides on this course! :)

results.content: Wow, instructor in exuberant state, enjoyed the way he presents the course that teaches to build real life projects that helps to upgrade skills for students like us. Keep it up ? , I hope to see API development course in future, with a real life project, not only project but also with full of explaination (theory part, with the way to architect API). Thank you so much for making such incredible the course.
